ygData.subject: Something strange...
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know if this has any relevency, but I was talking to a GM in Ak Anon next to one of the clock work spiders, and we all know what happens when you hail
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know if this has any relevency, but I was talking to a GM in Ak'Anon
next to one of the clock work spiders, and we all know what happens when you
hail them right? They say something to the effect of:
"This unit is not designed for casual conversation. Please move along."
Well, when I was done talking to the GM he said Good night to me before he
left. The spider said his usual message about moving along. I said good
night to the GM and the spider said it again. All the spiders respond to
"Good night." in the same way. This could mean abolutely nothing, but I just
though it was odd.
